articles.author: RFE/RL's Ukrainian Service
articles.title: Russia Hits Key Ukrainian Government Building For First Time Amid Record Drone Barrage In Kyiv - Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty
articles.description: Russian drone strikes have struck a key Ukrainian government building for the first time since Moscow’s full-scale invasion began, Kyiv said.
articles.content:
KYIV -- Russian drone strikes have struck a key Ukrainian government building for the first time since Moscows full-scale invasion began, Kyiv said.
